author: adrianc
msg: Small improvement to Web Tools Find Values screen - order values by pk.

author: pburba
msg: On the auto-props-sdc branch: Implement svn:config:auto-props, an inherited
property which well-behaved clients use to set auto-props in addition to
Currently svn:config:auto-props override config file auto-props and
svn:config:auto-props inherited from nearer path-wise parents override those
Note: There is one known test failure with this change: schedule_tests.py 11
rather than the previous method whereby svn_client__get_auto_props was
its replacement svn_client__get_paths_auto_props. Add a new hash arg
that contains all the possible autoprops.
(add_dir_recursive): Add a new hash arg that contains all the possible
autoprops and pass it along recursively and to add_file().
(svn_client__get_all_auto_props): New, gets all config file auto props and
explicit/inherited svn:config:auto-props for a WC path or URL.
(add): Gather all config file auto props and explicit/inherited once and
pass the results to add_dir_recursive and add_file.
(import_ctx_t): Add a new hash member to track all config file auto-props
(import): Add an argument corresponding to the new import_ctx_t member.
(svn_client_import5): Get all auto-props at start of import.

author: breser
msg: Allow swig-pl bindings to use update2, update3, update4.
(convert_svn_revnum_t): New private function to convert revnum to an iv.
(svn_swig_pl_revnums_to_list): New function to convert array of revnums to
(@_all_fns): Add update4 to list of functions to import.
(update): Convert documentation to refer to update2.
(update2): Add documentation that refers to update3.
(update3): Add documentation that refers to update4.
